Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 17 Maggārammaṇattika » 17.1 Paṭiccavāra » 17.1.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
Maggārammaṇattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
25.
2492Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā sattarasa, napurejāte sattarasa, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane nava, nakamme sattarasa, navipāke navippayutte sattarasa. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
2493Anulomapaccanīyaṃ.
